comment.author: 25100796@N08
comment._content: What was the occasion?  It would seem quite unusual to conduct a mass burial of what appears to be over a dozen veterans at one time.  Was it a reburial following a storm?

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/25100796@N08] Based on the date (September 8, 1935), the veterans were killed in the Labor Day Hurricane of 1935 while working on construction projects in the Florida Keys.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
